com.rockyw.core.base.mvp

类 BaseVpFragment<V extends IView,P extends IPresenter<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.rockyw.core.base.mvp.BaseVpFragment<V,P>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, IView, MvpCallback<V,P>
    直接已知子类:
    BaseVpListFragment, BaseVpTabListFragment

    public abstract class BaseVpFragment<V extends IView,P extends IPresenter<V>>
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements MvpCallback<V,P>, IView
    MVP模式的Base fragment
